0.3.3.name: wordpress/sendloop
0.3.3.description:
Sendloop is the easiest to use email marketing and mail list management service. In just seconds, you can integrate it with your WordPress powered blog or website and start making your very own email campaigns.

For installation instructions, please visit: http://sendloop.com/help/article/service-integration-009/wordpress-integration#installation_and_setup
